author: qu0b
content: Is there any reason we have withdrawals specced to withdraw any balance above > 32 eth and not considering if a validator is offline? Is it an intention to have validators lose their 32 effective balance mark and potentially have a reduced earnings period while they get back to this mark in case the get a withdrawal and are offline, thus dropping the balance below 32 ETH?

author: qu0b
content: Scenario: validator is offline with 32.02 ETH and is eligible for a withdrawal. The withdrawal is processed and their balance falls to 32 ETH. In the next epoch they miss an attestation and their balance falls below 32 ETH.

author: qu0b
content: A possible solution would be to add a check to the validator status and make sure that the validator is active and online before processing a withdrawal

author: sproul
content: effective balance only drops to 31 if balance reaches 31.75 AFAICR
